page.title: 03BLOOD PRODUCTS LABORATORY
page.content: The present work is done in huts and temporary laboratories. A new building is being erected with an April-May 1986 completion date. Because this new laboratory lies between two reservoirs it is being built on a platform supported by 30 metre concrete piles. The Laboratory takes delivery of {plasma}which has been collected from all the main{Blood Donor Centres}in England and Wales. With various treatments the plasma is broken down into its different{components}or {'fractions'.}Haemophiliacs rely on the blood clotting agent{'Factor 8' which this establishment supplies. Other products include{anti-tetanus} and {anti-mumps}vaccines. New products are being discovered all the time and research to find a treatment for the immune-deficiency disease{AIDS}is a current priority.
